Sections.SectionDescription: The following settings allow you to customize which spells of a given level added by 5e Spells are removed while one setting allows you to add exemptions to a list.

Settings.Name: Cantrips Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the cantrips created by 5e Spells.

Settings.Name: 5e 1st Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 1st level spells created by 5e Spells.

Settings.Name: 5e 2nd Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 2nd level spells created by 5e Spells.

Settings.Name: 5e 3rd Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 3rd level spells created by 5e Spells.

Settings.Name: 5e 4th Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 4th level spells created by 5e Spells.

Settings.Name: 5e 5th Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 5th level spells created by 5e Spells.

Settings.Name: 5e 6th Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 6th level spells created by 5e Spells.

Settings.Name: 5e 7th Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 7th level spells created by 5e Spells.

Settings.Name: 5e 8th Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 8th level spells created by 5e Spells.

Settings.Name: 5e 9th Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 9th level spells created by 5e Spells.

Settings.Name: Spell Exemptions
Settings.Description: List specific spell IDs to exempt certain 5e Spells from removal.

Sections.SectionDescription: The following settings allow you to remove additional spells added to class spell lists of a given level that were introduced in the title DnD 5e sourcebook.

Settings.Name: TCoE 1st Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 1st level spells added by 5e Spells to spell lists.

Settings.Name: TCoE 2nd Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 2nd level spells added by 5e Spells to spell lists.

Settings.Name: TCoE 3rd Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 3rd level spells added by 5e Spells to spell lists.

Settings.Name: TCoE 4th Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 4th level spells added by 5e Spells to spell lists.

Settings.Name: TCoE 5th Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 5th level spells added by 5e Spells to spell lists.

Settings.Name: TCoE 6th Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 6th level spells added by 5e Spells to spell lists.

Settings.Name: TCoE 7th Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 7th level spells added by 5e Spells to spell lists.

Settings.Name: TCoE 8th Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 8th level spells added by 5e Spells to spell lists.

Settings.Name: TCoE 9th Level Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to remove the additional 9th level spells added by 5e Spells to spell lists.

Settings.Name: Spare the Dying
Settings.Description: Enable to modify the Help action to require a Medicine ability check to stabilize creatures, giving Spare the Dying cantrip a use case.

Settings.Name: Raise Dead
Settings.Description: Enable to allow creatures to be affected by the Revivify spell only if they've been dead for 10 turns, giving Raise Dead a use case.

Settings.Name: Ritual Spells
Settings.Description: Enable to modify all non-ritual spells and have only the appropriate base game classes able to cast ritual spells.

Settings.Name: Booming Blade Modification
Settings.Description: Enable to remove Larian's version of Booming Blade or disable to remove 5e Spells' version of Booming Blade.
